verses.content: LALPA chun Mosie a biek a,
“Aron le a naupasalhai le Israel thlahai po po hril la, an kuom- ah, ‘Hi hi LALPA thupêk chu a nih.
Israel sûngkuo laia mi hrim hrim, bâwngchal amanih, berâmte amanih, kêl amani khawm ni sien, riebûka manih, riebûk puoa mani thata,

LALPA riebûk hmaa LALPA ta dinga thilinhlâna intuokna puon in kawtkhâr bula hung la naw taphawt chu, ama chu thisen insuoa ngai nîng a tih; thisen insuo ngei a na, ama chu a chipuihai laia inthawkin tuithlârin a um ding a nih.

Chu chu Israel thlahaiin hmun uolaua inthâwina an ithathai an hung chawi theina dingin, LALPA kuom ngeiah, intuokna puon in kawtkhâr bulah thiempu kuoma an hung chawi theina dingin le, LALPA kuoma inremna thilinhlâna an inhlân theina dingin a nih a;
Chun, thiempu chun intuokna puon in kawtkhâr bula mâichâm chu thisen chun thêng a ta, a thâu chu LALPA ta dinga rim inhniktaka dingin a raw ding a nih.
Lepchie taka umin, khawhrihai chu zuiin an kuomah an inthâwi ta hrim hrim ding a ni nawh,’ Hi hi an thlahai chena an kumkhaw dân ding a nih.
Chun, an kuomah hril la, Israel sûngkuo laia mi hrim amanih, ram dang mi anni laia khawsahaiin amanih, pumrawhmang thilinhlân amanih, inthâwina amanih ân hlân a,
LALPA kuoma inthâwi dinga intuokna puonin kawtkhâr bula hung la lo chu, ama ngei chu a chipuihai laia inthawka tuithlârin a um ding a nih.

“Chun, tukhawm Israel sûng- kuo laia mi amanih, ram dang mi anni laia khawsa amanih, ieng thisen khawm fa taphawt chu, chu thisen fatu chunga chun ka hmai sukthim ka ta, a chipuihai laia inthawka tuithlârin inumtir ka tih.
“Tisa hringna chu thisena chun a um sih a; in hringna intlanna siem- na dinga mâichâm chunga ka pêk cheu a nih; hringna dinga intlanna siemna chu thisen ngei chu a ni sih a.
Chuleiin, Israel thlahai kuom- ah, ‘Tukhawma thisen in fâk ding a ni nawh a, ram dang mi nangni laia khawsahai khawmin thisen chu an fâk ding a ni bawk nawh,’ ka ti a nih.
Chun, Israel thlahai laia mi amanih, ram dang mi anni laia khaw- sain amanih, ramsuoka sa amanih, vate amanih fâk thei a hung phur chun, a thisen chu suksuok a ta, pilvut a vur khum ding a nih.

“Tisa po po hringna chu thisen chu a ni sih a; chuleiin, Israel thlahai kuoma chun, ‘Ieng sa thisen khawm in fâk ding a ni nawh, tisa po po hringna chu a thisen chu a ni sih a; tukhawm a fa taphawt chu tuithlârin a um ding a nih.

Chun, mânia thi amanih, sa se amanih fa taphawt chu, chu rama mi hrim amanih, ram dang mi amani khawm ni sienla, a puonhai sâwp a ta, ân sil ding a nih; chun, zântieng chenin inthieng naw nîng a ta, chu hnunga chun inthieng hung nîng a tih.
Ân sâwp nawh a, ân sil naw ruok chun, ama rîtlona maw chu phur a tih,’ ti rawh,” tiin.
